techmeme.title: Microsoft launches new OpenAI-powered AI agents, Researcher and Analyst, designed to function as digital colleagues, available via its Agent Store (Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat)
Chainguard, which helps companies secure software supply chains, raised a $356M Series D led by Kleiner and IVP at a $3.5B valuation, up from $1.12B in 2024 (Allie Garfinkle/Fortune)
On the 20th birthday of its first video, YouTube says it has had 20T+ uploads, including 20M+ daily now, and unveils app and TV updates, including new Multiview (Abner Li/9to5Google)
London and Tel Aviv-based Cynomi, which offers a "virtual CISO" for SMBs, raised a $37M Series B, sources say at a $140M+ post-money valuation (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Nintendo says Switch 2 preorder demand in Japan "far exceeds expectations" and 2.2M applied via a lottery; Nintendo is offering a cheaper, region-locked model (Tom Phillips/Eurogamer.net)
